name: Grapple Run
description:
Swing your way through the world of Grapple Run. What is this?

This game was created in a day just for some fun to take a break from working on my current projects. The goal is to fly through levels using your grappling hook in the fastest time possible. At the moment there are no sound effects as I wasn't able to get around to them. If people like the game I may continue it in the future but otherwise, I hope you enjoy it.

Controls Movement: Space - Jump WASD - Move Grapple: LeftMouse - (hold)Fires grapple (release) returns grapple LShift - Reel in LControl - Reel out Air Movement: Pressing nothing - Continues the momentum of a swing WASD - Removes all momentum but allows for a small amount of movement for fine-tuning landings  LControl - Remove all Up and down (Y-axis) momentum Misc: P/ESC - Pause R - Quick restart Devlog:
